rows.label: tlk70000057_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, d'you guys know
about Core Chips? I do!

rows.label: tlk70000057_01_msg0002
rows.name:
They're not just something you carry
around like a pretty stone. You can
use them on Blade weapons, too!

rows.label: tlk70000057_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Then they'll give them more power
and sometimes even some special
effects! Isn't that cool?

rows.label: tlk70000057_01_msg0004
rows.name: Wish I could try using some... *Sigh*
